name: Firestarter (itch) (papermond)
description:
A far distant future where humanity has surpassed the boundaries of their solar system as well as parts of  their body's by replacing them with bionics and started colonizing other world such as this dystopian sci-fi world. We follow this young, rebellious girl on the run from her past as we help her to get to the train station to get out of there by taking the most dangerous rout over the roofs of the city. Controls

| Actions | Keyboard |         Gamepad           |

|_____|_______|____________ |

| Move      |  WASD       | LeftThumbStick      | 

| Interact | E                  | ActionButtonWest | 

| Pause     | Esc             | MenuButton             |

| Jump     | Space       | ActionButtonSouth |
